name: Dr. phillip Morphs
description: Neurologists are specialists who treat diseases of the brain and spinal cord, peripheral nerves and muscles.

name: Dr. Jessica Stans
description: Epidemiologists are public health workers who investigate patterns and causes of disease and injury

name: Dr. Brian Holmes
description: Dentists remove tooth decay, fill cavities, and repair fractured teeth and treat problems with patients' teeth, gums, and related parts of the mouth.

name: Dr. John M Brown
description: A surgeon is able to remove diseased tissue or organs, repair body systems, or replace diseased organs with transplants

name: Dr. David Adams
description: Plastic Surgeon can see patients who have conditions like birth disorders, injuries, illnesses, or burns.

name: Dr. William Stocks
description: Nephrologists treat kidney disease and mineral and fluid imbalances linked to kidney disease. They also treat high blood pressure.

name: Dr. Alfredo Terento
description: Cardiologists focus on the treatment of the heart, its blood vessels and heart-related issues and diseases.

name: Dr Shaun Murphy
description: An anesthesiologist administers drugs to numb pain or sedate patients during surgery. They monitor patients during surgery, keeping watch on their vital signs.
